snippet: On the last day of the transfer window, Manchester United made several moves, including lending out striker Javier Hernández to Real Madrid and replacing him with Radamel Falcao from Monaco.
abstract: Manchester United makes several moves on the last day of the transfer window, including lending out striker Javier Hernandez on a season-long loan to Real Madrid.
lead_paragraph: On the last day of the transfer window, Manchester United made several moves, including lending out striker Javier Hernández to Real Madrid and replacing him with Radamel Falcao from Monaco.
